name: movie_night_with_baby
description: Control smart home devices (lights, thermostat, locks, camera, speakers) by manipulating objects and calling their methods to automate home scenes.

turns.query: We're starting a movie night but the baby is sleeping in the nursery. First, check the nursery temperature sensor - if it's not between 20-22°C, adjust the thermostat to 21°C. Turn on the nursery camera recording to monitor the baby. Enable do-not-disturb on the doorbell so it won't ring and wake the baby.

Now set up the living room for the movie. Turn on the TV and set input to 'Netflix'. Dim the living room lights to 15% for ambiance. Close the living room blinds completely. Set the living room speaker volume to 35% (low volume because of the baby) and start it playing.

The movie is over and we're going to bed. Turn off all entertainment - TV and speaker. Turn off all lights in the house. Make sure the nursery is still being monitored (camera recording). Keep the doorbell in do-not-disturb mode overnight. Check all doors (front and back) and lock any that are unlocked.
